entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
